workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.24222702159970338 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.22773936215791984 --weight-decay 0.00012645762324112143 --lr 0.0007302273932991378 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 145496 --max-lr 0.0008227400724324703 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.8846915625210385 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.12177109593909621 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
